title: 求解决闪退问题
author: waiteqi
txt_content:
跟村民交易的窗口翻到最后一页的时候(尤其是在一些RPG生存地图里)就会闪退
版本1.7.10
我一开始以为是mod兼容问题 就把mod全下掉再去跟村民交易还是会闪退
错误报告
[11:47:19] [Server thread/ERROR]: An Entity type net.minecraft.entity.passive.EntityVillager has thrown an exception trying to write state. It will not persist. Report this to the mod author

求解决

replies.author: www35029527
replies.txt_content: 从开存档，按照崩溃原因试试
